name: Santa's Treat
description:
Artist/Animator - Alysha Chan

Programmer - Bubbz1

Music - Smallz

Font:  04b_30 by 04 On DaFont

Welcome to Santa's Treat! Your goal in this game is deliver all the gifts to the correct person. To find out where each gift is suppose to go you have to find clues scattered around the map. More clues will appear after collecting each clue and delivering gifts.

Controls

WASD - Movement E or Spacebar - Interact
